WRITING.TEXT: [PC] [EU] Snoring Dolphins Clan Recruitement - Everyone welcome Hello fellow guardians ! Our clan the [b]Snoring Dolphins[/b] are looking for guardians to reeinforce their ranks ! We're an active clan with currently 22 members and are looking for more. We have achieved all the (non-prestige) endlevel Pve content and Trials of the Nine. Join us if you want to enjoy Destiny2 in good company, it does not matter what gearlevel you have and if you are new or experienced. Most of our core members are very active and pretty good at the game so we can provide support and tryharding until we unlock all the weekly milestones, no matter what. We will always do the endgame content in PVP and PVE. We have a discord where you can hang out in chat and voice channels : [b]https://discord.gg/CYh8Cvw[/b] Our main language is english but we also speak french, german and norvegian. To apply, simply join the discord and wait for the private message of one of the admins that will drag you into the clan members section ! Thanks and hopefully see you soon !

WRITING.TITLE: Pitch your fav profession
WRITING.TEXT: Let me start of by saying that I am fully aware that they're probly a million similar topics and I also know that there is no fully subjective answer to this. Nonetheless, I'd like some advice or input to make a decision. I have played this game on and off since launch but never totally got hooked. I've tried pretty much every class (most of them only 'till around lvl 20-30 tho) and I always find myself lacking something, beeing it mobility, ability to AOE, complexity, etc.. That beeing said, i'd love to hear your ideas on: What class is the most fun/enjoyable to play in PVE (i don't play pvp) during leveling and ultimately in endgame. I plan on doing: map completion, dungeons, fractals, raids. I am aware that there is as many good answers as there is possiblities but what im looking for is people pitching their favorite class so i can understand all the aspects of that class and find out which one attracts me the most. Thank you in advance for your answers.

Ye i know i was lacking most of the build but i just got bored so fast. I hear a lot of ppl love mesmer might be what i should choose even tho on paper playing with illusion doesn't appeal to me that much
what do you mean "our" ?
Oh wow now that's dedication. Thanks for this i will have a closer look to that. Mesmer really seems to be the "in" class atm.
Good tip, I didn't know that
Dude! Thank you for this, it's exactly what i was looking for.
What trinkets should i be looking for once hitting 80 as a elementalist. I've got exotic crafting gear but only shitty trinkets
Well i have berserker exotic gear that i crafted which kinda used up all my monies so now I'm broke. Can i get good trinkets for karma ? what are the names i should look out for?

WRITING.TITLE: Weaver PVE Open World Build advice
WRITING.TEXT: Hai :) I'm new to playing weaver and I'm struggeling a lot in HoT content atm, dying in seconds and feeling like I'm doing everything wrong. I've tried playing staff but that doesn't work very well while beeing alone or even in small groups. I've tried sword/dagger and it's fun but i'm still lost as to what rotation i should use and what build alltogether. Basically my questions are : - Staff or S/DD? - What build ? What to focus on ? Thank you =)
Thanks:) So you would actually invest in tempest and not in weaver ?
Good points. Will keep it in mind. It's all very confusing at first I guess
Allright, thanks !
Would you still consider S/DD viable ? If so what traits would you focus on ?
Thank you for this, exactly what i was looking for. Will def try this out !

WRITING.TITLE: Help a fool decide
WRITING.TEXT: Help a fool decide ---- Most fun specialization in guild wars 2 - 2018 Cast your votes ! *decision solely based on fun* ---- |Vote Button| Poll Options|Current Vote Count| |:-----------:|:------------:|:------------| |**[Vote](http://redditpoll.com/vote/77bKH9QV)**|Reaper|**577** Votes |**[Vote](http://redditpoll.com/vote/XbO9Cl1W)**|Chronomancer|**77** Votes |**[Vote](http://redditpoll.com/vote/l5WPij28)**|Berserker|**61** Votes |**[Vote](http://redditpoll.com/vote/rz5PC5jD)**|Dragonhunter|**66** Votes |**[Vote](http://redditpoll.com/vote/ej7diMgm)**|Firebrand|**64** Votes ---- **Instructions:** * Click Vote to Register Your Vote. ---- **Note:** Vote Count in this post will be updated real time with new data. ---- Make Your Own Poll Here **[redditpoll.com](http://redditpoll.com)**. ---- See live vote count **[here](http://redditpoll.com/poll/help-a-fool-decide)**
I made a preselection of what i want to play and can't decide between those stated above. Will edit for more clarity
Can someone elaborate what's so fun about reaper ?

WRITING.TITLE: What's fun about reaper ?
WRITING.TEXT: Ok, the sythe is badass and all, but why is everyone so crazy about reaper ?

I don't care much about dps minmaxing im basically just doing map completion and SW and Metaevents atm but I dunno, Reapers feels quite boring imo, after playing it a cpl hours. I probly missed quite a bit about it, but still...

I see that my topic might sound offensive or so but im actually not complaining but genuinely interested. As I said i got a lot of people rooting for Reaper and now that I tried it I'm legit wondering what the fuss is all about.
Same as the rest, if there is anything i'd love to get a DM

WRITING.TITLE: Benchmark - What to aim for
WRITING.TEXT: Hi ! Tech noob here. #8203; What should i aim for in the benchmark. Fps - i get that. But what about the CPU and GPU % ? And the score ? Can someone break that down real quick? Is higher or lower better ? Thanks !
Thanks for the answer. Any idea about the score? I imagine the bigger the number the better or does it not matter?

WRITING.TITLE: Where is the UI menu ?
WRITING.TEXT: Hi, in various videos and guide i've seen that you could customize your UI and HUD by going into the UI menu in the settings. Wierdly enough i do not have that menu in my settings. Has it been removed or am I missing something ? Screenshot of my settings : [https://imgur.com/I55U44H](https://imgur.com/I55U44H) #8203;
Oh my god i feel stupid now, that actually makes sense aswell.. Thanks buddy

WRITING.TITLE: Map - Mission Audio Dialogues
WRITING.TEXT: Is there a way to disable the mouseover audio dialogues you get while browsing the map? It's really just noise when you try and figure out what to do next and it's a bit annoying. #8203;

WRITING.TITLE: Material cap perk 3 (500)
WRITING.TEXT: Hi, I just unlocked the material cap level 3 perk (so i should have 500 as a cap now). But when i browse my materials in my inventory, the max amount of each category is different, but not 500... What am i missing ?

I legit don't get the materials inventory. None of the caps are the same and none are what they are supposed to be judging by what the perks description says. Also when i want to deconstruct i get the message that i'll hit the cap somewhere but i do not... i don't get this

WRITING.TITLE: Effect opening inventory
WRITING.TEXT: Is there a way to disable the wierd glitching effect that occurs when opening the inventory (or any menu for that matter)? #8203; #8203;

WRITING.TITLE: .50cl ammo shortage - Sharpshooter specialization
WRITING.TEXT: I've read a couple threads from 10-20ish days ago about the special ammo shortage that occurs on all the signature weapons BUT the sniper. I've unlocked the sniper and have played with that class for about 3-4h. I am ALWAYS out of ammo, i can barely find any. I kill almost every enemy with headshots (using DMR or pistol) and find maybe 1 bullet every 20 enemies killed... what's that all about?

I've unlocked the 1 perk that gives me ammo on sign. weap. kill and the one on hs kills. Still get fuckall as drops. THanks for the advice of going back to the desk, that works but i'm still upset by the VERY low amount of ammo drop. Dunno if that's on purpose or smthing is wrong with my game but it makes the -50cal sniper pretty much unusable, which is sad.
That. Exactly that!

WRITING.TITLE: Sharpshooter specialization rant
WRITING.TEXT: That sniper is 100% broken. The amount of shots i take that legit do NOTHING is insane. \- NO i'm not missing my target im dead on their head \- NO it's not bullet travel time, i'm not that far I shoot - gt; nothing happens. No hitmarker, just nothing. Then i take the exact same shot - gt; enemy dead. This coupled with the limited ammo drops makes it really frustrating !
I doubt that. It might be in some cases, but mostly im hardscoping on a guy in cover waiting for his head to pop up, that's way longer than 3 seconds.

I mean, i'm not discredition your advice, and i will be more carefull about the zoneing in. But i just feel like most of the shots i take do nothing and i really don't see how those bullets could miss...makes me frustrated cuz i love the class. #8203;

Lucky you. I'm trying to figure out if i'm doing something wrong or if it's a bug on my side. Feels like a bug because none shots i take with normal snipers feel that way. I mean sure i might miss but i'm pretty good with snipers and i can tell if the shot i take was supposed to hit the target or not
Ok thank you for your advice, i will make sure to pay more attention to that :)

WRITING.TITLE: Use slinger with SnS unsheated (PC)
WRITING.TEXT: Hey y'all I'm sure this was already answered somewhere but I couldn't find a solution : While i have my sword (SnS) out i can activate the reticle of the slinger, but i can't shoot. By default shooting is with LMB but while unsheated, that would result in a Chop attack. So i changed the fire button to MMB, but that doesn't do anything if I have my weapons out. If i sheat my weapons then i works, but I thought one advantage of SnS is to be able to use items and slinger on the go... Can someone help ? Thanks in advance
Well damn. No i didn't and yes it works. Thank you dude, I feel a bit silly now :D

WRITING.TITLE: How to use Helm breaker with SnS (PC)
WRITING.TEXT: Me again. Sorry for the question "spam" but I'm trying real hard to figure this game out on PC, and I'm a total newby to the franchise and to this type of games in general.. #8203; From guides I've seen that you can use the *Helm Breaker* attack with SnS if you run up a wall and then activate it. From what i've seen, on consoles you activate it with triangle, which would translate to LMB on PC (i think). But all I get with LMB is jumping slash. Did they remove this attack? I tried every possible combo i could think of.

Yeah, this I was aware of, but I think I'm talking about another attack. From videos (granted they're all 1 year old) i learned that if you sprint up a shroom wall you can climb up and then jump back down doing that Helm Breaker attack. I've tried this multiple times in the training area but couldn't figure out how to do it.
Ye see and if I do that on keyboard and mouse (so basically LMB + RMB) it only does a jumping slash, but not the Healm Breaker. MAybe it just doesn't work with Keyboard and Mouse ?
I would think so too but when I do exactly that it does not work. Thanks for your help tho
Ohhhhhhhh ! That's it ! Just did it :) I was always doing the slash while climbing. Thanks you mate
Dude that's no problem at all ! I'm glad you sticked around and helped me out :) Thank you again ! Good Hunting !

WRITING.TITLE: What's the point of light level ?
WRITING.TEXT: I don't quite understand the correlation between the item level and the stats, especially on armor. I have items that are way lower than the drops i get, but have much better stats. Also, what is the point of infusing armor to increase the light level, if the stats remain the same ?

Thanks for all the answers. So if I understand correctly, higher ilvl grants more damage for weapons, and more armor for equipment ? In crucible, should i preoritzie ilvl or stats (like resilience or mobility i.e.?). Sorry, it's quite confusing for me.

WRITING.TITLE: Unable to launch activity when in fireteam
WRITING.TEXT: Is there fix for said bug ? It happens everytime i try to launch with a friend

Crucible, Quest, Quick travel. Anything, 80% of the time launch button is not working. Both my friend and I have access to all expansions. When we disband and team up again it mostly works (sometimes it doesn't). It's just really annoying.

WRITING.TITLE: How do I make adventures heroic nowadays ?
WRITING.TEXT: I need to do an advanture on heroic mode on mars (and also one on Titan) but I don't quite get how to set them to heroic ? I haven't played since launch, this has changed i think
Oh. Thanks. This is wierd :) How can I tell the flashpoint is on that planet ?

WRITING.TITLE: WEASEL Error frequent
WRITING.TEXT: Hey. A friend of mine has this problem : while playing, every so often (every couple of hours) he get's a WEASEL error and gets kicked out of the game. His internet connection is stable, he doesn't have any problem with other games or while browsing. This happens every day, since he started playing again with the launch of Shadowkeep. He plays via Steam, on PC. Here's what he tried already : setting the NAT Types to those recommended by Bungie, restarting his router, reinstalling the game. Any ideas, or known fixes ? Thanks a bunch for the help
